contents.text: Thank you for calling Compology in San Francisco, the only camera-based dumpster monitoring solution for waste, recycling and compost.
For existing customers needing technical support or troubleshooting, press 1.
Press 1 for camera or sensor troubleshooting.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to troubleshoot our dumpster camera sensor—it’s not sending data.
I need help troubleshooting my on-site dumpster camera—it’s not sending any images.
Troubleshoot intermittent camera feed dropouts affecting fill-level detection on my dumpster monitoring system.
Please help me reset my dumpster camera—I'm not getting any images.
I need help calibrating and troubleshooting my dumpster camera sensors; they’re misaligned and not recording properly.

contents.text: Press 2 to report service outages or request urgent maintenance.
One moment please while we transfer you to our maintenance team.

navigationGoals: I need to report an outage on our compost bin camera and request immediate maintenance.
My dumpster sensors have stopped reporting—I need urgent maintenance dispatched.
Report an urgent service outage: my sensor array has gone offline and needs immediate field maintenance.
I need urgent repair; my dumpster camera has stopped working.
I’m experiencing a service outage—my compost bin sensor has gone offline and needs immediate maintenance.

contents.text: For sales, new account setup, or pricing information, press 2.
Press 1 for details on our monitoring plans and pricing.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I want pricing details for adding two more dumpsters to our monitoring plan.
I’d like to set up a new account and get pricing for my veteran-owned waste monitoring service.
Request detailed pricing and API integration options for an enterprise-level monitoring plan supporting 50+ units.
I want to understand your subscription plans and pricing for a new account.
I’d like details on your monitoring plans and pricing for deploying multiple cameras across our university campus.

contents.text: Press 2 to speak with our government contracting department.
Thank you for your interest; please hold while we transfer you to our GovTech team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss government contracting options for our waste monitoring service.
I’m a veteran nonprofit looking to explore government contracting options with your GovTech team.
Discuss FedRAMP compliance and GSA contract terms for deploying your sensor solution in a municipal government program.
I need to speak with someone about government contracts for waste monitoring.
I’m exploring government contracting options to integrate Compology sensors into a state-funded waste management research project.
